title: The Basics of HTML
body: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is the foundation of any web page. It's used to structure content on the web and define the relationships between different elements.

title: CSS Styling Tips
body: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) allows you to control the visual presentation of your web pages. Use classes and IDs to target specific elements and apply styles.

title: Introduction to JavaScript
body: JavaScript is a versatile programming language that adds interactivity to your web pages. You can use it to create dynamic content, handle user interactions, and more.

title: Debugging Techniques
body: Debugging is an essential skill for developers. Learn how to use browser developer tools, console.log, and breakpoints to find and fix errors in your code.

title: Version Control with Git
body: Git is a powerful version control system that helps you manage and track changes to your code. Learn the basics of branching, committing, and collaborating with others.
